species.description: SPECIES (VISUAL & VIBE POOL) - Grouped by visual interchangeability for Asset Generation

groups.name: Vampire / Dhampir
groups.visual_description: Pale, elegant, fangs, gothic or tactical attire, red/black motifs

groups.name: Skeleton
groups.visual_description: Visible bones, empty sockets, potentially wearing armor or streetwear

groups.name: Reanimated (Zombie / Ghoul / Corpse)
groups.visual_description: Decaying flesh, grey/green skin tones, ragged clothing, shuffling posture

groups.name: Spirits (Ghost / Banshee / Wraith / Rusalka / Shadow Demon)
groups.visual_description: Translucent, glowing, floating, trailing vapors, spectral appearance, silhouettes

groups.name: Elementals (Stone / Ice / Fire / Air / Water / Blood / Plant / Slime / Peat / Asphalt / Bubblegum / Void)
groups.visual_description: Body made entirely of the specified substance, lacking standard biology, abstract shapes or humanoid approximations

groups.name: Animal Hybrids (Werewolf / Cat / Lion / Fox / Horse / Minotaur / Lizardwoman / Frogman / Dog-Man / Parrot-Man / Kenku / Spider-Man / Spider-Woman)
groups.visual_description: Anthropomorphic blend of human and specific animal, fur/scales/feathers, extra limbs, animal head or features on humanoid frame

groups.name: Constructs (Golem [Scrap/Flesh/Marble/Mud/Gum] / Statue / Gargoyle / Mimic)
groups.visual_description: Artificial appearance, visible joints/seams, made of inorganic material (metal, stone, trash, flesh-staples), rigid or mechanical movement

groups.name: Small Fae (Pixie / Sprite / Leprechaun / Goblin)
groups.visual_description: Diminutive stature, oversized features (ears/eyes), wings (if applicable), mischievous or magical aura

groups.name: High Fae (Elf / Drow / Dryad / Quickling)
groups.visual_description: Tall, slender, angular features, pointed ears, elegant or nature-integrated attire

groups.name: Hags & Witches
groups.visual_description: Crones or magical practitioners, carrying mystical implements, surrounded by aura or runes

groups.name: Giants (Ogre / Troll / Giant / Fomor)
groups.visual_description: Oversized, muscular or corpulent, brutish features, heavy/clumsy visual weight

groups.name: Dwarf
groups.visual_description: Short, stout, broad, grounded stance, often bearded or masked

groups.name: Merfolk (Mermaid / Siren / Merman)
groups.visual_description: Upper body humanoid, lower body fish/aquatic tail, aquatic accessories

groups.name: Reptilian (Gorgon / Basilisk)
groups.visual_description: Snake-hair or reptilian features, snake lower body (if Gorgon), predatory gaze

groups.name: Preserved (Bog Body)
groups.visual_description: Leathery skin, peat-stained, ancient but intact features

groups.name: Harpy / Angel
groups.visual_description: Winged humanoids, avian features, divine or monstrous aesthetic
